item.title: Week 4 Lecture 1: Bayesian Learning; An Introduction
item.description: Bayesian Probability Talks about probability interpretation based on partial beliefs. Bayesian Estimation Calculates validity of a proposition: based on Prior Estimate of its prob New relevent evidence Baye’s Theorem \( P(h|D) = frac{P(D|h)P(h)}{P(D)} \)
